trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Ironton
There was one other sighting in Ironton on or around April 19th 2011
Summary: It was a cigar craft and it was soft green in color.
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was a cigar or blimp shaped craft soft green in color. It flew quite low i did not see any life forms or and windows. It flew over me and my daughter about 75 feet up. It was about as big as 2-3 cars put together. I do not wish to be contacted.
